documents.document:
Dog Bandanas For Fashion

Bandanas on canines, is it just a fad that’s common in excellent spots like Aspen and Lake Tahoe? Is it indicative of individuals who really like the outside and live in the country ? I don’t know, I simply know that I have put bandanas on my canines for years, even when I lived in the city. I think bandanas on canines are a fashion statement which can make your dog look not only cool, but says a thing about you and your dog.
Bandanas on k9s have been known to make the dog appear a lot more approachable. I believe a frightening looking Doberman looks much less of a risk once wearing a brightly coloured bandana.
I also think the dog knows he or she looks cool with a bandana on. When I take mine off my k9s to clean them, they act as if they miss having them on. Or perhaps I’m projecting my own thoughts.
Dog bandanas can additionally be functional. There is a store on-line that sells dog bandanas that have a pocket for your doggie poopie bag. They refer to them as Dog BagDanas. I often hated carrying those darn bags, now my canines can hold their own. A great idea I say, wish I’d thought of it. You know I have bandanas for my dogs for each occasion, Christmas, Fall, Valentines Day, 4th of July, St Patricks Day, to name a few. I also possess bandanas for my favorite sports teams. I typically get comments when I’m out around town with my canines sporting their bandanas.
Fashion statement or just a excellent thing for your dog to wear, I’m not sure, but I do know, simply as a woman can’t have too many shoes, a dog can’t have enough bandanas!

http://www.blogabond.com/TripView.aspx?TripID=87193

http://www.k9bandanas.com/2011/03/christmas-dog-bandana/, http://www.k9bandanas.com, http://www.k9bandanas.com/2011/06/football-dog-bandana/
